column1: Alliances, Area Majority / Influence, Auction / Bidding, Dice Rolling, Hand Management, Simultaneous Action Selection

Die Macher is a game about seven sequential political races in different regions of Germany. Players are in charge of national political parties, and must manage limited resources to help their party to victory. The winning party will have the most victory points after all the regional elections. There are four different ways of scoring victory points.
